amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.catchline: License; required; compliance with codes; exception.
amendatorysection.para: It shall be unlawful for any person to do any plumbing in any such city or village, or within the area of the zoning jurisdiction outside the corporate limits of cities of the metropolitan class, which has established a plumbing board unless he holds a proper license. It shall be unlawful for any person to make any connection to water mains extended from within and beyond the zoning jurisdiction of a city of the metropolitan class which has established a plumbing board, unless he complies with the applicable plumbing codes of the metropolitan city and holds a proper license as required thereby; Provided, that the requirements of this section shall not apply to employees of the water utility acting within the scope of their employment.
